publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2943 Pauline McNeill: Welcome to Professor Karen Vousden at the Beatson Institute—That the Parliament welcomes the announcement by Cancer Research UK on 15 March of a £10 million grant for the Beatson Institute in Glasgow; notes that this support will enable the west of Scotland cancer centre to become a world centre for cancer research; further notes that this commitment to the Beatson Institute is particularly welcome as a clear indication of confidence in the institute, and calls on MSPs of all parties to welcome Professor Karen Vousden as the new director of the Beatson Institute and wish her every success in advancing gene therapy to the benefit of cancer patients throughout Scotland and the world.
